summary: TL*- THE CONTACT OWNS A 5TH WHEEL 2005 HEARTLAND LANDMARK GRAND CANYON RV.  THE VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED ON DECEMBER 21, 2006.   AFTER DRIVING THE VEHICLE HOME NOTICED WATER COMING FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE CAMPER, AND IT WAS SAGGING FROM THE BOTTOM.  THE CONTACT SCHEDULED AN APPOINTMENT ON JANUARY 6, 2007.  THE DEALER NOTICED THE 5TH WHEEL FRAME WAS CRACKED AND STATED THAT THE CRACK WAS IN THE I-BEAM OF THE FRAME. THE RV DEALER  WOULD NOT GIVE REFUNDS, NOR DID HE WANT A NON RESALABLE CAMPER ON HIS LOT.  THE CONTACT CALLED THE ATTORNEY GENERALS OFFICE IN INDIANA AND FILED A COMPLAINT.  THE CONTACT FELT  THAT THE DEALER SOLD HER A VEHICLE THAT WAS UNSAFE.  *AK
